info.title: DotAAS Part 2 | HTTP/REST | Entire API Collection
info.description: The entire API collection as part of Details of the Asset Administration Shell Part 2

contact.name: Constantin Ziesche, Andreas Orzelski, Florian Krebs, Bastian Rössl, Manuel Sauer, Jens Vialkowitsch, Michael Hoffmeister, Torben Miny, Sebastian Bader, Marko Ristin, Nico Braunisch

parameters.name: assetIds
parameters.description: A list of specific Asset identifiers

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Determines the structural depth of the respective resource content

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Determines the request or response kind of the resource

parameters.name: extent
parameters.description: Determines to which extent the resource is being serialized

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: A non-negative number defining the offset item.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The maximum number of elements in the response array.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sorting pattern which shall be applied. A combination of <attribute>:<direction> is used where <attribute> is an attribute of the AAS element and <direction> is either ascending ('asc') or descending ('dsc'). Note that not all possible AAS attributes are allowed for sorting.

default.description: Default error handling for unmentioned status codes
